summary.span: 提供与 Visual Basic 6.0 之间的兼容性，使您可以使用 Microsoft ActiveX 数据对象 () 创建到数据库的连接。

span.span: Provides compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 , which enabled you to create a connection to a database using Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用此控件以继续使用`ADO`数据连接。Use this control in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to use an `ADO` data connection. 对于新开发，应考虑使用`ADO.NET`而不是`ADO`。For new development, you should consider using `ADO.NET` instead of `ADO`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[比较的 ADO.NET 和 ADO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/98f2c0cd-437d-4934-8be5-c174b6782cae)。For more information, see [Comparison of ADO.NET and ADO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/98f2c0cd-437d-4934-8be5-c174b6782cae). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `BOF`和返回值由当前行指针的位置，此指针是否有效。The `BOF` and return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid. 如果任一`BOF`或是`true`，没有没有当前行，并且任何尝试引用的数据会导致异常。If either `BOF` or is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference data causes an exception. 你可以使用`BOF`和属性来确定是否对象包含行或是否已超出限制的随着从行至行。You can use the `BOF` and properties to determine whether an object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an as you move from row to row. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前 在本地内存中缓存的记录数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current .

value.span: 一个 ，指定当前 对象在本地内存中缓存的记录数。

span.span: An that specifies the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current object.

value.span: 默认值为 50 个记录。

span.span: The default is 50 records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CacheSize`值指示提供程序在其缓冲区和多少个记录一次提取到本地内存中保留的记录数。The `CacheSize` value tells the provider how many records to keep in its buffer and how many records to fetch at one time to local memory. 例如，当设置为 10，打开第一个之后，提供程序到本地内存提取前 10 条记录。For example, when set to 10, after opening the first , the provider fetches the first 10 records into local memory. 因此，当您从当前记录向前移动，该提供程序从本地内存缓冲区返回的数据值。Therefore, as you move forward from the current record, the provider returns the data values from the local memory buffer. 只要你移至最后一条记录，接下来的 10 记录会从数据源提取到缓存。As soon as you move past the last record, the next 10 records are fetched from the data source into the cache. 尽管你可以将光标的生命周期内更改值，此更改仅在数据源的下一次提取后影响缓存中的记录数。While you can change value during the life of the cursor, the change only affects the number of records in the cache after the next fetch from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`释放参数设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 当处置参数是`true`，此方法释放由该控件引用任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: When you override , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .
